column4: I am attempting to get to irc.starchat which i've used successfully for years.  tonight I'm computer is delivering a note that says " connected" but then it says its "lost connection.,  Anyone know what might be causing this failure?
someone on your lan is hogging the latency with torrents ?
check your dns ? make sure that your gateway mac address is really the maccaddress of your gateway and not someone doign a mitm attack
maybe reboot the router ... no idea. its a problem that requires lots of debug info i suppose before any realy suggestions can be given
